When a span tag has its contenteditable attributes set to true, and when the user is editing that span, there's a problem if he want to delete the first character in the span tag (either with backspace or delete keys).

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. create an html document with a div where each word is enclosed in a span tag with contenteditable="true"
2. click on a word and start to edit it
3. try to remove the first character of this word
Actual Results:  
the character is not deleted and some (visual) space is inserted before the span tag.

Expected Results:  
the character should simply be deleted

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. create an html document with a div where each word is enclosed in a span tag with contenteditable="true"
2. click on a word and start to edit it
3. try to remove the first character of this word
Actual Results:  
the character is not deleted and some (visual) space is inserted before the span tag.

Expected Results:  
the character should simply be deleted

It also happens if I select some part of the word which include the first character and then I try to delete it using backspace or delete, or if I try to replace it by typing some other character. None of the selected characters disappear and some space is added before the span tag.

comments.text:
There's also a problem with the nightly build, but it's not exactly the same.
This time the problem happen with the last characters of span tags.

With the backspace key: everything is okay.

With the delete key: I can't delete the last char, but no space is added.

When selecting letters in the span tag:
- if I select letters in the middle of the span tag (non-including neither first or last char): everything is fine.
- if I select letters which include the first one but not the last one: everything is fine.
- if I select letters which include the last one but not the first one:
--- backspace key: it just unselect the text instead of removing it.
--- delete key: same problem.
--- replacing by typing another char: same problem.
- if I select the whole span tag:
--- backspace key: nothing happen.
--- delete key: same problem
--- replacing by typing another char: same problem.

I'm adding an html file as attachment.
